title:
Superimposed Hi-C: A Solution Proposed for Identifying Single Cell's
  Chromosomal Interactions
authors:
Jia Zhang, Li Xiao, Peng Qi, Yaling Zeng, Xumeng Chen, Duan-fang Liao,
  Kai Li
abstract:
Hi-C sequencing is widely used for analyzing chromosomal interactions. In
this study, we propose "superimposed Hi-C" which features paired EcoP15I sites
in a linker to facilitate sticky-end ligation with target DNAs. Superimposed
Hi-C overcomes Hi-C's technical limitations, enabling the identification of
single cell's chromosomal interactions.
